thread.section_title: Hotel 31 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hidden Gem
thread.title_full: Hidden Gem - Review of Hotel 31, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sueylt
title: Hidden Gem
text:
The hotel is located in a very safe and clean neighborhood. Near the Empire State Building and close to a lot of the big attractions. The hotel is older but very, very clean. If you like older buildings, this is a must. The price was incredible. We had a double bed and shared a bathroom. The bathroom was extremely clean and it seemed that someone kept an eye on it and kept it clean.
Room Tip: Look on line to choose the best room for your needs. See more room tips
